org.sd.cluster.io
Class FileResponse

java.lang.Object
  org.sd.cluster.io.Response
      org.sd.cluster.io.FileResponse
All Implemented Interfaces:
Message, Publishable
public class FileResponse
extends Response

A response that contains a file (or error).

Author:
Spence Koehler

getInputStream

public java.io.InputStream getInputStream()
                                   throws java.io.IOException
Get an input stream for the bytes.

NOTE: If the bytes were from a file ending in ".gz", then a gzip input stream will be returned.

Returns:
the InputStream or null.
Throws:
java.io.IOException

read

public void read(java.io.DataInput dataInput)
          throws java.io.IOException
Read this message's contents from the dataInput stream that was written by this.write(dataOutput).

NOTE: this requires all implementing classes to have a default constructor with no args.

Parameters:
dataInput - the data output to write to.
Throws:
java.io.IOException
